name: AIA - Anthony Chevallier
prompt: You are the Personal AI Assistant of Anthony Chevallier, tailored to help Anthony. Like JARVIS and Tony Stark in Iron man, you help Anthony build is personal brand and be efficient and authentic in its daily tasks. Be fun and sharp. Always ground your responses to Anthony's ontology, and explain your reasoning.
ontology:
classes:
- definition: (Elucidation) A function is a disposition that exists in virtue of its
    bearer's physical make-up & this physical make-up is something the bearer possesses
    because it came into being either through evolution (in the case of natural biological
    entities) or through intentional design (in the case of artefacts) in order to
    realize processes of a certain sort
  example: The function of a hammer to drive in nails; the function of a heart pacemaker
    to regulate the beating of a heart through electricity
  id: bfo:BFO_0000034
  name: function
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000016
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -150.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: An ISO 8601 Temporal Instant with Offset.
  example: 2024-09-24T07:30:45-0700
  id: abi:DateTimeOffset
  name: DateTime Offset
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000203
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: A material entity responsible for producing and distributing publications.
  example: Penguin Random House publishing company.
  id: abi:Publisher
  name: Publisher
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: abi:Business
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 7
- definition: A role that exists because an individual is volunteering for various
    activities or services.
  example: A volunteer coach for a youth sports team.
  id: abi:VolunteeringRole
  name: Volunteering Role
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: (Elucidation) A role b is a realizable entity such that b exists because
    there is some single bearer that is in some special physical, social, or institutional
    set of circumstances in which this bearer does not have to be & b is not such
    that, if it ceases to exist, then the physical make-up of the bearer is thereby
    changed
  example: The priest role; the student role; the role of subject in a clinical trial;
    the role of a stone in marking a property boundary; the role of a boundary to
    demarcate two neighbouring administrative territories; the role of a building
    in serving as a military target
  id: bfo:BFO_0000023
  name: role
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000017
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -450.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) An occurrent is an entity that unfolds itself in time
    or it is the start or end of such an entity or it is a temporal or spatiotemporal
    region
  example: As for process, history, process boundary, spatiotemporal region, zero-dimensional
    temporal region, one-dimensional temporal region, temporal interval, temporal
    instant.
  id: bfo:BFO_0000003
  name: occurrent
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000001
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 1
    x: 750.0
    y: -1125.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A spatial region is a continuant entity that is a continuant
    part of the spatial projection of a portion of spacetime at a given time
  example: As for zero-dimensional spatial region, one-dimensional spatial region,
    two-dimensional spatial region, three-dimensional spatial region
  id: bfo:BFO_0000006
  name: spatial region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000141
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -1650.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A temporal region is an occurrent over which processes
    can unfold
  example: As for zero-dimensional temporal region and one-dimensional temporal region
  id: bfo:BFO_0000008
  name: temporal region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000003
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: 1050.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: (Elucidation) p is a process means p is an occurrent that has some temporal
    proper part and for some time t, p has some material entity as participant
  example: An act of selling; the life of an organism; a process of sleeping; a process
    of cell-division; a beating of the heart; a process of meiosis; the taxiing of
    an aircraft; the programming of a computer
  id: bfo:BFO_0000015
  name: process
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000003
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: 150.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: An organization dedicated to furthering a particular social cause or
    advocating for a shared point of view.
  example: Red Cross, a humanitarian organization.
  id: abi:NonprofitOrganization
  name: Non-profit Organization
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: abi:Organization
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 6
- definition: (Elucidation) A fiat surface is a two-dimensional continuant fiat boundary
    that is self-connected
  example: The surface of the Earth; the plane separating the smoking from the non-smoking
    zone in a restaurant
  id: bfo:BFO_0000146
  name: fiat surface
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000140
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1200.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: A generically dependent continuant representing recognition or accolades.
  example: Nobel Prize in Literature
  id: abi:Honors&awards
  name: Honors & awards
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000031
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: (Elucidation) A temporal instant is a zero-dimensional temporal region
    that has no proper temporal part
  example: The millennium
  id: bfo:BFO_0000203
  name: temporal instant
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000148
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: 1350.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A site is a three-dimensional immaterial entity whose
    boundaries either (partially or wholly) coincide with the boundaries of one or
    more material entities or have locations determined in relation to some material
    entity
  example: A hole in a portion of cheese; a rabbit hole; the Grand Canyon; the Piazza
    San Marco; the kangaroo-joey-containing hole of a kangaroo pouch; your left nostril
    (a fiat part - the opening - of your left nasal cavity); the lumen of your gut;
    the hold of a ship; the interior of the trunk of your car; hole in an engineered
    floor joist
  id: bfo:BFO_0000029
  name: site
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000141
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -1050.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: A type of role that focuses on a specific area of interest or activity
    for social, cultural, or environmental improvement.
  example: Environmental conservation cause.
  id: abi:Cause
  name: Cause
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: (Elucidation) A realizable entity is a specifically dependent continuant
    that inheres in some independent continuant which is not a spatial region & which
    is of a type some instances of which are realized in processes of a correlated
    type
  example: The role of being a doctor; the role of this boundary to delineate where
    Utah and Colorado meet; the function of your reproductive organs; the disposition
    of your blood to coagulate; the disposition of this piece of metal to conduct
    electricity
  id: bfo:BFO_0000017
  name: realizable entity
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000020
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 3
    x: -300.0
    y: -375.0
- definition: A three-dimensional immaterial entity representing a specific area or
    region.
  example: New York City
  id: abi:Location
  name: Location
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000028
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 6
- definition: The act of working at a job or profession.
  example: John working as a software engineer at Google
  id: abi:ActofWorking
  name: Act of Working
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: A subclass of temporal interval with specific date representation.
  example: 2023-08_Current
  id: abi:TimeInterval
  name: Time Interval
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000202
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: (Elucidation) A two-dimensional spatial region is a spatial region that
    is a whole consisting of a surface together with zero or more surfaces which may
    have spatial regions of lower dimension as parts
  example: The surface of a sphere-shaped part of space; an infinitely thin plane
    in space
  id: bfo:BFO_0000009
  name: two-dimensional spatial region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000006
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1650.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A material entity is an independent continuant has some
    portion of matter as continuant part
  example: A human being; the undetached arm of a human being; an aggregate of human
    beings
  id: bfo:BFO_0000040
  name: material entity
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000004
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 3
    x: -1650.0
    y: -375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A generically dependent continuant is an entity that exists
    in virtue of the fact that there is at least one of what may be multiple copies
    which is the content or the pattern that multiple copies would share
  example: The pdf file on your laptop; the pdf file that is a copy thereof on my
    laptop; the sequence of this protein molecule; the sequence that is a copy thereof
    in that protein molecule; the content that is shared by a string of dots and dashes
    written on a page and the transmitted Morse code signal; the content of a sentence;
    an engineering blueprint
  id: bfo:BFO_0000031
  name: generically dependent continuant
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000002
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: -900.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: A process that involves an individual or group receiving recognition,
    accolades, or awards for their achievements or excellence.
  example: The ceremony where John was awarded the Nobel Prize; the event where Jane
    received the Employee of the Month award.
  id: abi:ActofBeingHonored
  name: Act of Being Honored
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: An entity with a social structure and goals.
  example: Apple Inc., a technology company.
  id: abi:Organization
  name: Organization
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000030
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: A type of role that focuses on a specific sector of economic activity.
  example: The technology industry.
  id: abi:Industry
  name: Industry
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: A disposition that enables an individual to communicate using a specific
    system of symbols, sounds, or gestures.
  example: English language proficiency.
  id: abi:Language
  name: Language
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000016
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: p is a process boundary =Def p is a temporal part of a process & p has
    no proper temporal parts
  example: The boundary between the 2nd and 3rd year of your life
  id: bfo:BFO_0000035
  name: process boundary
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000003
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: 600.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: b is an immaterial entity =Def b is an independent continuant which
    is such that there is no time t when it has a material entity as continuant part
  example: As for fiat point, fiat line, fiat surface, site
  id: bfo:BFO_0000141
  name: immaterial entity
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000004
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 3
    x: -1200.0
    y: -375.0
- definition: A role that exists because an individual or organization is involved
    in the creation of content.
  example: A blogger writing articles for a website.
  id: abi:ContentCreationRole
  name: Content Creation Role
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: A generically dependent continuant representing a profile on LinkedIn.
  example: John Doe's LinkedIn profile
  id: abi:LinkedInPage
  name: LinkedIn Page
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000031
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: (Elucidation) A disposition b is a realizable entity such that if b
    ceases to exist then its bearer is physically changed & b's realization occurs
    when and because this bearer is in some special physical circumstances & this
    realization occurs in virtue of the bearer's physical make-up
  example: An atom of element X has the disposition to decay to an atom of element
    Y; the cell wall is disposed to transport cellular material through endocytosis
    and exocytosis; certain people have a predisposition to colon cancer; children
    are innately disposed to categorize objects in certain ways
  id: bfo:BFO_0000016
  name: disposition
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000017
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -150.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A one-dimensional temporal region is a temporal region
    that is a whole that has a temporal interval and zero or more temporal intervals
    and temporal instants as parts
  example: The temporal region during which a process occurs
  id: bfo:BFO_0000038
  name: one-dimensional temporal region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000008
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 3
    x: 900.0
    y: -375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A continuant fiat boundary b is an immaterial entity that
    is of zero, one or two dimensions & such that there is no time t when b has a
    spatial region as continuant part & whose location is determined in relation to
    some material entity
  example: As for fiat point, fiat line, fiat surface
  id: bfo:BFO_0000140
  name: continuant fiat boundary
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000141
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -1350.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: b is a specifically dependent continuant =Def b is a continuant & there
    is some independent continuant c which is not a spatial region & which is such
    that b specifically depends on c
  example: (with multiple bearers) John's love for Mary; the ownership relation between
    John and this statue; the relation of authority between John and his subordinates|
    (with one bearer) The mass of this tomato; the pink colour of a medium rare piece
    of grilled filet mignon at its centre; the smell of this portion of mozzarella;
    the disposition of this fish to decay; the role of being a doctor; the function
    of this heart to pump blood; the shape of this hole
  id: bfo:BFO_0000020
  name: specifically dependent continuant
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000002
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: -450.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A fiat line is a one-dimensional continuant fiat boundary
    that is continuous
  example: The Equator; all geopolitical boundaries; all lines of latitude and longitude;
    the median sulcus of your tongue; the line separating the outer surface of the
    mucosa of the lower lip from the outer surface of the skin of the chin
  id: bfo:BFO_0000142
  name: fiat line
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000140
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1350.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A fiat point is a zero-dimensional continuant fiat boundary
    that consists of a single point
  example: The geographic North Pole; the quadripoint where the boundaries of Colorado,
    Utah, New Mexico and Arizona meet; the point of origin of some spatial coordinate
    system
  id: bfo:BFO_0000147
  name: fiat point
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000140
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1050.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: A generically dependent continuant representing the content of a course
    of study.
  example: Introduction to Computer Science
  id: abi:Course
  name: Course
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000031
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: A role that an individual occupies within the context of a university
    or academic institution.
  example: The role of a professor at a university.
  id: abi:UniversityRole
  name: University Role
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: The act of engaging in volunteer activities.
  example: Tom volunteering at a local food bank
  id: abi:ActofVolunteering
  name: Act of Volunteering
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: (Elucidation) A fiat object part b is a material entity & such that
    if b exists then it is continuant part of some object c & demarcated from the
    remainder of c by one or more fiat surfaces
  example: The upper and lower lobes of the left lung; the dorsal and ventral surfaces
    of the body; the Western hemisphere of the Earth; the FMA:regional parts of an
    intact human body
  id: bfo:BFO_0000024
  name: fiat object part
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000040
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -2250.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) An entity is anything that exists or has existed or will
    exist
  example: Julius Caesar; the Second World War; your body mass index; Verdi's Requiem
  id: bfo:BFO_0000001
  name: entity
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 0
    x: 0.0
    y: -1500.0
- definition: (Elucidation) An object is a material entity which manifests causal
    unity & is of a type instances of which are maximal relative to the sort of causal
    unity manifested
  example: An organism; a fish tank; a planet; a laptop; a valve; a block of marble;
    an ice cube
  id: bfo:BFO_0000030
  name: object
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000040
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -1950.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A zero-dimensional temporal region is a temporal region
    that is a whole consisting of one or more separated temporal instants as parts
  example: A temporal region that is occupied by a process boundary; the moment at
    which a finger is detached in an industrial accident
  id: bfo:BFO_0000148
  name: zero-dimensional temporal region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000008
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 3
    x: 1350.0
    y: -375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A three-dimensional spatial region is a whole consisting
    of a spatial volume together with zero or more spatial volumes which may have
    spatial regions of lower dimension as parts
  example: A cube-shaped region of space; a sphere-shaped region of space; the region
    of space occupied by all and only the planets in the solar system at some point
    in time
  id: bfo:BFO_0000028
  name: three-dimensional spatial region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000006
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1500.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: A process involving the activities required to invent, document, file,
    and obtain a patent for a novel invention or discovery.
  example: An engineer developing a new technology, documenting the invention, and
    filing a patent application.
  id: abi:ActofCreatingPatent
  name: Act of Creating Patent
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: A process where an individual or entity actively engages in a project,
    contributing to its objectives and outcomes.
  example: Researcher contributing to a scientific study by collecting data and analyzing
    results.
  id: abi:ActofParticipatinginProject
  name: Act of Participating in Project
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: (Elucidation) A continuant is an entity that persists, endures, or continues
    to exist through time while maintaining its identity
  example: A human being; a tennis ball; a cave; a region of space; someone's temperature
  id: bfo:BFO_0000002
  name: continuant
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000001
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 1
    x: -750.0
    y: -1125.0
- definition: An organization involved in commercial, industrial, or professional
    activities.
  example: Amazon, an e-commerce company.
  id: abi:Business
  name: Business
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: abi:Organization
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 6
- definition: b is an independent continuant =Def b is a continuant & there is no
    c such that b specifically depends on c or b generically depends on c
  example: An atom; a molecule; an organism; a heart; a chair; the bottom right portion
    of a human torso; a leg; the interior of your mouth; a spatial region; an orchestra
  id: bfo:BFO_0000004
  name: independent continuant
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000002
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 2
    x: -1500.0
    y: -750.0
- definition: A human being regarded as an individual.
  example: John Doe
  id: abi:Person
  name: Person
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000030
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: The act of obtaining a license or certification.
  example: A doctor completing their medical board certification exam.
  id: abi:ActofCertifying
  name: Act of Certifying
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000015
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 3
- definition: b is a relational quality =Def b is a quality & there exists c and d
    such that c and d are not identical & b specifically depends on c & b specifically
    depends on d
  example: A marriage bond; an instance of love; an obligation between one person
    and another
  id: bfo:BFO_0000145
  name: relational quality
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000019
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 4
    x: -750.0
    y: 0.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A one-dimensional spatial region is a whole consisting
    of a line together with zero or more lines which may have points as parts
  example: An edge of a cube-shaped portion of space; a line connecting two points;
    two parallel lines extended in space
  id: bfo:BFO_0000026
  name: one-dimensional spatial region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000006
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1800.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: (Elucidation) A zero-dimensional spatial region is one or a collection
    of more than one spatially disjoint points in space
  example: The spatial region occupied at some time instant by the North Pole
  id: bfo:BFO_0000018
  name: zero-dimensional spatial region
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000006
  style:
    color: '#97c1fb'
    fixed: true
    group: 5
    x: -1950.0
    y: 375.0
- definition: A role that an individual occupies in a professional context.
  example: The role of a doctor in a hospital.
  id: abi:ProfessionalRole
  name: Professional Role
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000023
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 5
- definition: An organization that provides educational services to students.
  example: Harvard University, an Ivy League school.
  id: abi:School
  name: School
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: abi:Organization
  style:
    color: yellow
    group: 6
- definition: A disposition that enables an individual to perform tasks associated
    with a specific profession or job role.
  example: Programming skills for a software developer.
  id: abi:ProfessionalSkills
  name: Professional Skills
  relations:
  - label: is_a
    to: bfo:BFO_0000016

- class: abi:ActofStudying
  description: "L'objectif de la formation est d'instaurer une m\xE9thode d'apprentissage
    et d'adaptation qui transcende la simple accumulation de comp\xE9tences techniques,
    gr\xE2ce \xE0 la r\xE9alisation de projets contraint dans le temps, en totale
    autonomie, seul ou en groupe, sur diverses probl\xE9matiques de programmation
    dans diff\xE9rents langages.\nCela permet aux \xE9l\xE8ves de d\xE9velopper une
    polyvalence exceptionnelle, les dotant de la capacit\xE9 \xE0 s'ajuster de mani\xE8re
    efficace \xE0 une vari\xE9t\xE9 de besoins et de d\xE9fis techniques en milieu
    professionnel."

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "Contexte : Naas.ai est une plateforme open-source de gestion de donn\xE9e
    bas\xE9e sur Jupyter,\nqui d\xE9mocratise l'IA et les flux de donn\xE9es avec
    des templates low-code et des mod\xE8les d'IA g\xE9n\xE9rative.\nIls cr\xE9ent
    un framework permettant de cr\xE9er de puissants produits/workflows alliant donn\xE9es
    et IA.\n\nMissions :\n- R\xE9\xE9crire des parties cruciales de l'application
    pour passer du POC \xE0 la prod\n- Aider l'\xE9quipe \xE0 appliquer et d\xE9finir
    les best practices et les guidelines de l'application\n- Concevoir et d\xE9velopper
    des interfaces utilisateurs lisibles et efficaces."

  name: Anthony C | Lead Developer Frontend | naas.ai

  style:

    group: LinkedIn.ProfileView

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "En tant que d\xE9veloppeur d'applications mobiles chez MyNotary, j'ai
    jou\xE9 un r\xF4le central dans la conception, le d\xE9veloppement et l'am\xE9lioration
    des applications mobiles pour les plateformes Android et iOS. Mon engagement a
    \xE9t\xE9 d\xE9terminant dans l'\xE9laboration d'interfaces intuitives, r\xE9pondant
    aux besoins sp\xE9cifiques de nos clients.\n\nPrincipales responsabilit\xE9s et
    r\xE9alisations :\n\nConception d'Interfaces Utilisateur (UI/UX) : En collaboration
    \xE9troite avec notre \xE9quipe de designer, j'ai \xE9labor\xE9 des interfaces
    utilisateur intuitives et esth\xE9tiques, bas\xE9es sur les retours des clients.
    Cela a impliqu\xE9 la compr\xE9hension approfondie des besoins des utilisateurs
    et la cr\xE9ation d'exp\xE9riences visuelles engageantes.\n\nD\xE9veloppement
    d'applications mobiles : J'ai dirig\xE9 le d\xE9veloppement d'applications mobiles
    performantes et r\xE9actives pour les syst\xE8mes Android et iOS. Mon r\xF4le
    a consist\xE9 \xE0 traduire les besoins fonctionnels en fonctionnalit\xE9s concr\xE8tes
    tout en mettant en place les bonnes pratiques techniques ainsi qu'une version
    simplifi\xE9e de la Clean Architecture pour assurer la scalabilit\xE9 dans le
    temps.\n\nInteraction avec les clients : Organiser des sessions d'\xE9change avec
    les clients a permis de recueillir des retours en temps r\xE9el, d'identifier
    les points d'am\xE9lioration et d'ajuster les applications en cons\xE9quence,
    renfor\xE7ant ainsi la satisfaction des utilisateurs.\n\nOutils d'am\xE9lioration
    de l'exp\xE9rience utilisateur : J'ai mis en place des outils analytiques avanc\xE9s
    pour \xE9valuer et comprendre les comportements des utilisateurs, facilitant ainsi
    l'identification des d\xE9fis et des opportunit\xE9s d'am\xE9lioration. Ces donn\xE9es
    ont aliment\xE9 la prise de d\xE9cision strat\xE9gique et ont contribu\xE9 \xE0
    optimiser l'exp\xE9rience globale des utilisateurs.\n\nMon passage chez MyNotary
    a \xE9t\xE9 marqu\xE9 par une combinaison r\xE9ussie de comp\xE9tences techniques
    en d\xE9veloppement mobile et de sensibilit\xE9 aux besoins des utilisateurs,
    conduisant \xE0 des applications innovantes et orient\xE9es utilisateur."
  id: abi:ActofWorking#AnthonyC%7CFullstackMobileDeveloper%7CMyNotary-Lajuristech
  name: Anthony C | Fullstack Mobile Developer | MyNotary - Lajuristech

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "GoSpot.me est une agence immobili\xE8re parisienne qui propose un
    service en ligne de recherche de biens gr\xE2ce \xE0 un syst\xE8me de matching
    avec les biens g\xE9r\xE9s par l'agence.\nGr\xE2ce \xE0 un produit low-code, l'agence
    permet \xE0 ses clients de d\xE9finir une recherche pr\xE9cise et d'obtenir des
    notifications quand un bien correspondant est match\xE9.\n\nMissions :\n- Cr\xE9er
    l'algorithme de matching\n- Cr\xE9er le syst\xE8me de notification"
  id: abi:ActofWorking#AnthonyC%7CSoftwareDeveloper%7CGoSpot.me

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "En charge de la conception et du d\xE9veloppement de l'application
    Android WeeSurf, j'ai con\xE7u et d\xE9velopp\xE9 une application compos\xE9e
    d'une carte interactive permettant aux utilisateurs d'obtenir des informations
    sur environ 3000 points d'int\xE9r\xEAts li\xE9s au monde du surf.\nL'application
    permet entre autre aux utilisateurs d'\xE9changer des conseils ou des informations
    (\xE9quipements, spots, bon plans, etc..) via un syst\xE8me de profil permettant
    aux utilisateurs de ce suivre entre eux pour cr\xE9er un r\xE9seau de surfeurs.\nTechnologies
    : API Rails (Ruby), Application native en Java & Kotlin."
  id: abi:ActofWorking#AnthonyC%7CAndroidDeveloper%7CWeeSurf
  name: Anthony C | Android Developer | WeeSurf
  relations:

    group: LinkedIn.ProfileView
- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "Frontend :\nDe 2017 \xE0 2019, j'ai particip\xE9 \xE0 optimiser l'application
    Web initiale de MyNotary sur AngularJS, avec une refonte majeure vers une Clean
    Architecture simplifi\xE9e. \nEn 2019, face \xE0 des limitations, j'ai co-pilot\xE9
    une transition de stack r\xE9ussie vers React.js / Typescript.\nPuis pendant 4
    ans, j'ai contribu\xE9 au d\xE9veloppement des fonctionnalit\xE9s de la plateforme,
    et \xE0 l'optimisation des performances de l'application. \nEn 2022, j'ai particip\xE9
    \xE0 la migration du code vers une architecture Hexagonale pour uniformiser l'architecture
    Front et Back, tout en impl\xE9mentant des tests unitaires via Jest, des tests
    E2E, et du component testing via Cypress puis Playwright.\n\nBackend :\nDe 2017
    \xE0 2021, j'ai particip\xE9 au d\xE9veloppement de l'API Java / Restlet de MyNotary,
    incluant la cr\xE9ation de fonctionnalit\xE9s, correction de bugs, am\xE9lioration
    du code, et migration / int\xE9gration de nouvelles conventions de code. \nA partir
    de 2021, nous avons entam\xE9 une migration vers une API Node.js sous NestJS,
    int\xE9grant des tests unitaires Jest, en ajoutant des fonctionnalit\xE9s et en
    \xE9tablissant de nouvelles conventions et outils pour l'environnement Node.js.\n\nCes
    6 ann\xE9es ont \xE9t\xE9 marqu\xE9es par des migrations techniques fr\xE9quentes,
    exigeant une mise \xE0 jour constante de mes comp\xE9tences, outils, ainsi que
    de mes connaissances en architecture et en conventions de programmation. Collaborant
    avec une dizaine de d\xE9veloppeurs au fil des ans, j'ai soutenu la mise en place
    de solutions techniques adapt\xE9es aux besoins de l'entreprise.\n\nCette exp\xE9rience
    m'a permis de me former aux c\xF4t\xE9s de d\xE9veloppeurs plus exp\xE9riment\xE9s,
    d\xE9couvrant de nouvelles techniques et pratiques, mais aussi de former des d\xE9veloppeurs
    moins exp\xE9riment\xE9s et des non-initi\xE9s (juristes, commerciaux) que j'ai
    pu initi\xE9 aux pratiques de d\xE9veloppement telles que du scrapping/scripting
    simple et l'utilisation/cr\xE9ation d'outils sp\xE9cialis\xE9s, simplifiant ainsi
    les interactions et facilitant le d\xE9veloppement des \xE9quipes au sein de l'entreprise."
  id: abi:ActofWorking#AnthonyC%7CFullstackWebDeveloper%7CMyNotary-Lajuristech
  name: Anthony C | Fullstack Web Developer | MyNotary - Lajuristech

    color: grey

  summary: "Passionn\xE9 par l'exp\xE9rience utilisateur et la r\xE9solution de probl\xE8mes,
    je suis anim\xE9 par la volont\xE9 de cr\xE9er des outils efficaces qui simplifient
    la vie des utilisateurs. Mon engagement se focalise particuli\xE8rement sur les
    projets ayant un impact significatif sur le client final, visant \xE0 lui faire
    gagner du temps, accro\xEEtre la transparence ou renforcer son autonomie.\n\nMon
    bagage technique, forg\xE9 par mes exp\xE9riences pass\xE9es, refl\xE8te ma polyvalence
    sans \xEAtre limit\xE9 \xE0 une sp\xE9cialisation sp\xE9cifique. Je consid\xE8re
    la technique comme un outil au service de la r\xE9solution des probl\xE8mes clients,
    et je suis ouvert \xE0 l'apprentissage de nouvelles technologies et outils pour
    relever les d\xE9fis futurs.\n\nMa passion pour l'exp\xE9rience utilisateur et
    les interfaces esth\xE9tiques m'a conduit \xE0 acqu\xE9rir des connaissances minimales
    dans les bonnes pratiques du domaine. Cette d\xE9marche me rend relativement autonome
    et facilite les interactions avec les \xE9quipes de conception. Je suis convaincu
    que l'alliance de comp\xE9tences techniques et d'une sensibilit\xE9 pouss\xE9e
    pour l'exp\xE9rience utilisateur constitue la cl\xE9 pour cr\xE9er des solutions
    technologiques exceptionnelles."
